articles.title: The History Behind the Current Monkeypox Outbreak - Medscape
articles.description: There are now more than 100 cases of monkeypox in Europe, Canada, and the United States.
articles.content: What is the cause of monkeypox? Monkeypox is a member of the Poxviridae family of viruses called orthopoxvirus and is a double-stranded DNA virus. This subset includes the smallpox (variola), vaccini… [+7711 chars]
